title: (x) OGA Certified Organic - Georgia {Stephen}
content:
Hi,

I was supplied this logo for a job but am required to redraw this as it was supplied as a poor quality jpeg :-/  
What is the typeface used in this? Thanks in advance.

comments.content: Good ol’ Georgia and Georgia Bold. Don’t have to buy a thing.
